meanings.sent1: The ossifrages soared high in the sky, searching for their next meal.
meanings.sent2: The ossifrages nested in the tall trees of the forest.
meanings.sent3: The ossifrages decided to have a family picnic on a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: The ossifrages' sharp eyes spotted the hidden prey among the rocks.
meanings.sent5: The ossifrages' wingspan was truly impressive, spanning over six feet.

meanings.definition: A bird of prey that feeds on bones.
meanings.sent1: The ossifrages scavenged for bones in the desolate landscape.
meanings.sent2: The ossifrages' beaks were perfectly adapted for cracking bones.
meanings.sent3: The ossifrages hosted a bone buffet for their feathered friends.
meanings.sent4: The ossifrages' bone-crunching feast echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The ossifrages' bone collection was the envy of the avian world.
